group_1.textLeft: ...and so my family is in danger of@being separated.
I mean, seriously, garnishment...
It's like the time my family went bankrupt and@had to skip town in the dead of night to survive.
That's no longer out of the question...@We've gone full circle. It's utterly ridiculous.

group_1.textRight: Your family had to skip town in the@middle of the night...?
You've been through a lot...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I would do anything for my@cute little brothers and sister.

group_1.textRight: You've always had a soft spot for little kids@like your siblings, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's why I love you too, Hinano.

group_1.textRight: Why you...!
...But, are you sure you're okay?@Garnishment, that's...

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, the situation's pretty bad.
But as long as I work all month and have@money coming in, it's fine for now...

group_1.textRight: Are you sure? You're not overworking yourself,@are you?
If going to tomorrow's performance is@too much for you, don't worry about it.
Your family should come first...

group_1.textLeft: What, don't go?
But this is the first performance of a@play you wrote, right?
I hate fantasy, but...

group_1.textRight: You say this in front of a girl who's literally@writing a fantasy story as we speak?
And on the verge of death from juniors@hounding her for updates?

group_1.textLeft: Geeze, just let me finish.
...I was going to say that your work@is the only one I like...

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Sae's showing a soft side!

group_1.textLeft: ...A-and that's why I'm looking forward to it!
I don't even have work that day.

group_1.textRight: But that's not what you said before...

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...
Well, I'll definitely be there, I promise.

group_1.textRight: ...Okay, I got it. Thank you.
That said, it's very fortunate that you got@that tutoring job when you did.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I really lucked out this time.

group_1.textRight: You've got a bit of an evil smile there, Sae.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*...Really, she was such a perfect mark.

group_1.textCenter: She may be the daughter of a rich household@or whatever, sure,
but she hadn't the slightest inkling that I was@only approaching her for her family's status.
And she even gave a job to a@penniless wretch like me, to boot!

group_1.textRight: Oh, sorry, that might have been my@bag falling over.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...That scared the hell out of me.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Anyway, that was an amazing performance!
I'd love to cast you as a rising villainess!
...Ahh, thank goodness, it was just an act...

group_1.textLeft: Is that how you see me?
I'm not THAT bad a girl...

group_1.textRight: Sorry...
For a second, I thought to myself that you@really would say that...
But Sae's surprisingly kindhearted and@hardworking to a fault.

group_1.textLeft: Kindhearted and hardworking to a fault...
I think that describes you better than me.

group_1.textRight: Hey, would you actually like to play a@villainess on stage sometime?

group_1.textLeft: No. At least give me a positive role.

group_1.textRight: ...Sheesh.
I know no one ever comes to this@empty classroom, but...
You never know who might be listening.
Even if you're just acting, don't go overboard,@okay?

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I understand.
Besides, the girl I'm tutoring is actually@a very nice girl.
Well, the money's nice, of course...
But I've never been a tutor before,@so it's pretty fun.
